uk.me.m0rjc.picstategenerator.picAsmBuilder

Class Pic18AsmBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.me.m0rjc.picstategenerator.picAsmBuilder.Pic18AsmBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IModelVisitor

    public class Pic18AsmBuilder
extends Object
implements IModelVisitor
    Build assembly source code for the PIC18. Outputs .asm, .inc and .h for use with C code.
    Author:
    Richard Corfield <m0rjc@m0rjc.me.uk>

      • setProcessor

        public void setProcessor(String processor)
        Processor name for the LIST directive. If null then no LIST directive will be output.
        Parameters:
        processor - processor name, for example "18F14K50"

      • setLargeRomModel

        public void setLargeRomModel(boolean largeRomModel)
        Parameters:
        largeRomModel - if true then 3 byte pointers will be used.

      • setFileBaseName

        public void setFileBaseName(String fileBaseName)
        Base name for output files. Defaults to the model name. For example if the base name is "gps" then output files would be "gps.asm", "gps.inc", "gps.h"
        Parameters:
        fileBaseName - file base name, for example "gps" or "/home/richard/output/gps"

      • addInclude

        public void addInclude(String includeName)
        Add the name of a file to #include in the assembler module.
        Parameters:
        includeName - name of an include file, for example "p18f14k50.inc"

        public void addReturnLine(String line)
        Add a line to the code that is needed to return control from the step function.
        Parameters:
        line - line of code to return, for example "RETURN" or "RETFIE"

      • startSharedEntryCode

        public void startSharedEntryCode(INode node)
        Description copied from interface: IModelVisitor
        Start rendering commands to run on entering the node at the end of a state transition. Will be followed by visitCommand* followed by a visitTransitionGoToNode
        Specified by:

      • startNode

        public void startNode(INode node)
        Description copied from interface: IModelVisitor
        Start a Node. The Node will be started, all its transitions visited, then the node ended before any other nodes are visited. The first node to be started is the root node.
        Specified by:
        startNode in interface IModelVisitor
        Parameters:
        node - the node to start code for.

        public void visitTransitionPreconditionGE(Variable variable,
                                 int value)
        Description copied from interface: IModelVisitor
        Encode a transition precondition for Greater or Equals. If variable >= value then continue, otherwise if possible IModelVisitor.pop() or continue to the next transition.

        Description copied from interface: IModelVisitor

        Description copied from interface: IModelVisitor

      • endTransition

        public void endTransition(Transition transition)

      • push

        public void push()
        Description copied from interface: IModelVisitor
        Enter a sub-block of code. Equivalent to open brace in C. In Assembler a label will be created at the corresponding pop(). The location of that label will be used by the #saveReturnOnStack() method and the IModelVisitor.exitCodeBlock(int) method.

        This can be used in condition processing to create a decision tree, and in subroutine processing to create the GOSUB command.

        Client code must ensure that all push and pop balance within a transition.

        Specified by:
        push in interface IModelVisitor

      • saveReturnOnSubroutineStack

        public void saveReturnOnSubroutineStack()
        Description copied from interface: IModelVisitor
        After a IModelVisitor.push() store the location of the corresponding IModelVisitor.pop() on the subroutine stack.

        Usage:

         push()
    saveReturnOnSubroutineStack() // Saves LABEL1
    visitTransitionGoToSharedEntryCode(subroutineNode)
 pop() // LABEL1
        Specified by:
        saveReturnOnSubroutineStack in interface IModelVisitor
        See Also:
        GosubCommand

      • exitCodeBlock

        public void exitCodeBlock(int levels)
        Description copied from interface: IModelVisitor
        After a IModelVisitor.push() GOTO the corresponding POP if levels = 0. If levels is more than 0 then more levels will be exited. This is like the break command in Java and C.

        Examples:

         push()
   exitCodeBlock(0)  // GOTO LABEL1
   push()
     exitCodeBlock(0)   // GOTO LABEL2
     exitCodeBlock(1)   // GOTO LABEL1
   pop()  // LABEL2
 pop()   // LABEL1
        Specified by:
        exitCodeBlock in interface IModelVisitor
        Parameters:
        levels - 0 for the current level, more for greater depths of local code blocks.

      • pop

        public void pop()
        Description copied from interface: IModelVisitor
        Exit a sub-block of code. Equivalent to close brace in Java and C. In Assembler a label will be created, its name determined by the corresponding IModelVisitor.push().
        Specified by:
        pop in interface IModelVisitor
